resources.string: Plac Nowy in Kraków is one of the most famous places serving zapiekanki. \n\nA zapiekanka is an open-face sandwich made of half of a baguette or other long roll of bread, topped with sautéed white mushrooms, cheese and sometimes other ingredients, and toasted until the cheese melts. Served hot with ketchup, it is a popular street food in Poland.
